name: UNDERWATER: STAY ALIVE
description:
Life on earth is in danger. A research team has been sent into outer space to explore new habitable worlds
where humans can start a new life.

Near an unknown planet the research ship falls out of hyperspace. All controls and sensors have failed
leaving the vessel dead in space. You have no choice but abandon ship in an escape pod.

The entire surface of the unknown oceanic planet is frozen. Upon impact the escape pod managed to break through the ice cap.

An amazing alien world is revealed in from of your eyes. Your task is to survive and find out the cause
of your ship's tragic events. But BEWARE !!!  You are not the only survivor in the ocean’s depth.
